title: Microsoft golf (PC)
brief_description: Close your eyes and smell the sea. You’re mesmerized by the drama and wonder of Torrey Pines. A bird chirps. The wind shifts. Thwaak. You follow the ball as it glides towards the sun - this is multimedia golf. SYSTEMS REQUIREMENultimedia Pc or compatible with 386SX or higher microprocessor; 2MB of RAM, 5MB of hard-disk space; VGA or higher resolution monitor; MS DOS operating system, version 3.1 or higher; Microsoft Windows operating system, version 3;1 or higher.
